name: Infinivania
description:
Escape from the painted worlds of the mad Vladovich von Painter in this procedurally generated classic action platformer! Face hordes of undead, demons, and evil pumpkins as you fight your way out of a nightmare!

  • Experience the game feel of the NES classics--time your attacks and jumps carefully, or fall to your doom
  • No two runs are alike - Vlad will paint you a new unique challenge with every new game
  • Enjoy original chiptunes and fan made remixes
  • Two different adventurers get trapped in Vlad's nightmare, each with their own subweapons
  • Two painting themes and bosses, each with their own unique enemies and traps
  • Much more content yet to come!

Default controls (Soon to be configurable ingame):

  • Move left and right,  look up and down, and climb stairs with the arrow keys, WASD, or a controller DPad or thumbstick
  • Attack with the X key, left mouse button, or left face button on the controller
  • Jump with the Z key, space bar, or bottom face button on the controller
  • Use subweapons by pressing up and attack
  • To buy from the ingame shop, use up or attack when standing in front of a shop item

Wow, you actually read all of that! (Or maybe you didn't.) Either way, join us on our Discord at https://discord.gg/HuxBuNxR3x

Note: Game is very early in development! Expect lots of bugs and rough edges.

Update notes:
0.1.3 - First public release! Includes the things in the description above, and also probably a whole bunch of bugs!
